entry.title: Trying Google Search Console part II

link.title: Trying Google Search Console part II

entry.summary: I am still learning about Google Search Console, and after some time I finally got some information. Like performance: I can see how many times my website appeared in a search Or indexing: There are some pages that aren’t being indexed The image above shows that there are some issues that doesn’t allow google to index all my pages. To see what is happening I went to the Indexing -> Pag...

entry.title: How I expanded my LUKS and LV (Logical Volumes) partitions

link.title: How I expanded my LUKS and LV (Logical Volumes) partitions

entry.summary: I used to dual boot in a 1 TB nvme, but it was almost full so I got a new nvme disk of 2TB. And I wanted to use the new disk only for Linux and the old one for Windows. lsblk looked like this: lsblk NAME MAJ:MIN RM SIZE RO TYPE MOUNTPOINTS nvme0n1 259:0 0 1.8T 0 disk nvme1n1 259:1 0 931.5G 0 disk ├─nvme1n1p1 259:2 0 100M 0...

entry.title: Trying Google Search Console
entry.summary: The Search Console is a tool from Google that help us to improve the position of our webpages in Google search results. It offers ways to measure traffic, perfomance and fix issues1. I want to give a try to make my blog a little bit better and give it more presence on the web. Currently if I check the details of the search result of one of my blog post it would look like this: Details show...

entry.title: Fixing Surviving Mars
entry.summary: The problem I noticed the linux native version of Surviving Mars has issues with my dual monitor setup. Basically it disables my vertical one but that is not all, it also has some glitches. The objects seems to be “floating” and the shadows are not touching anything. I discovered that using the windowed mode, my second monitor keeps working, but the glitches still. I added some photos be...

entry.summary: Two weeks ago I noticed that M213S wasn’t charging correctly (the led was red and it was beeping awfuly loud), so I thought that maybe it was the battery. I bought this vaccum used a few years ago thus the lifespan I think it was normal.
